ygData.subject: Re: [RE: [eqbards] How do you play this game?]
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, you obviously haven t played a dark elf.  Talk about a confusing city. ... From: Webber, Jessica  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
heh, you obviously haven't played a dark elf. Talk about a confusing city.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 2:20 PM
Subject: RE: [RE: [eqbards] How do you play this game?]


> My theory on that is that someone decided that Kelethin should be the most
> difficult town in the game. It's easy to get lost. It's easy to fall off
> if your unfamilar with it. And it's easy to get frustrated as a newbie
when
> the elevator you've seen going up and down won't come down when you get to
> the platform. (my first char was a wood elf bard, not Evulia though, and
I
> honestly had no idea how the elevators worked. I think I made it to level
> three before figuring it out)
>
> Peace
> Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Harmonie Moonsong [mailto:harmoniemoonsong@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 2:16 PM
> > To: eqbards@egroups.com

> >

> > The default is the U key. in settings it is the one
> > called use center screen if i remember correctly. A
> > question for everyone else. Why wont the U key work on
> > the lifts in Kelethin?
> >
> > --- Lisa <Lilyanatwin@...> wrote:
> > > Question........how do you use the keyboard to open
> > > doors?
